backend/main.mo: Defines the actor’s core data model for rooms, styles, products, orders, projects, and utilities, including array helpers and type structures for the backend.
backend/migration.mo: Contains legacy type definitions and migration logic for transforming old stored data into the new backend schema, including product and furniture structures.
feature_evidence.json: Lists features, related code files, components, and test IDs used for tracking implementation evidence of product search and furniture navigation features.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of various frontend React components, hooks, pages, and utilities.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS base file defining design tokens, light/dark theme variables, and global styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point that mounts the React app and loads the main TypeScript module.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes and QueryClient, defining all main pages including shop, products, dashboard, and furniture subcategory routes within the SiteLayout.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Displays a dialog for new authenticated users to enter and save basic profile details using form inputs and mutation hooks.
frontend/src/components/cart/AddToCartBu: Provides a button to add a product to the cart with inventory checks and toast feedback.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Consul: Form allowing authenticated users to request a consultation by submitting a date, notes, and generated request metadata.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteLayou: Page layout wrapper including header, footer, and the profile setup dialog around page content.
frontend/src/components/navigation/SiteF: Renders the footer with branding, social links, service links, and dynamically listed locations.
frontend/src/components/navigation/SiteH: Renders the site header with navigation, category dropdown, authentication controls, and cart count integration.
frontend/src/components/packages/Package: Displays informational sections describing the design process and package inclusions using cards and icons.
frontend/src/components/packages/room-pa: Displays a product within a package with image, name, description, price, and stock badge.
Shows sortable included products grid and renders product cards based on selected sort option.
Skeleton UI representing loading state for included products.
Displays selected room package details, price, labels, and an add-to-cart button.
Renders a grid of room package list items and handles selection state.
Card UI for an individual room package with style, room type, description, and selectable highlighting.
Skeleton loading UI for the room package list.
frontend/src/components/packages/StylePa: Manages style and room-type filters, loads matching room packages and products, and handles selecting and adding a full package to cart.
frontend/src/components/products/GlobalP: Provides global product search with debounced query, results grid, and loading/error states.
frontend/src/components/products/Product: Displays a product with image, details, stock indicator, price, and add-to-cart button.
frontend/src/components/products/SafeExt: Image component that swaps to a fallback source if the main image fails to load.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to user identity and refreshes dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUserProfile: Fetches the caller’s user profile using the current actor and exposes loading state.
frontend/src/hooks/useDebouncedValue.ts: Provides a hook that returns a debounced version of a value using a timeout.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements context and provider for Internet Identity authentication, exposing identity state and login/logout methods.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating backend data such as designers, packages, briefs, notes, and consultations.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserRole.ts: Provides hooks to fetch the caller's user role and admin status via the actor API.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup with custom light and dark theme variables and base styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/cart/CartPage.tsx: Renders the shopping cart with item listing, quantity controls, subtotal, and checkout navigation, including an empty-state view.
frontend/src/pages/checkout/CheckoutPage: Handles order checkout with delivery address validation, payment selection, order placement, and user authentication checks.
frontend/src/pages/dashboard/DashboardPa: Displays the user's project briefs with loading/error states and allows navigation to start new design projects.
frontend/src/pages/DesignerDetailPage.ts: Displays detailed information for a single designer, including bio, styles, and portfolio with loading and error states.
frontend/src/pages/DesignersPage.tsx: Lists designers with search and style filtering, using designer data from the backend.
frontend/src/pages/FaqPage.tsx: Displays a FAQ page with an accordion listing predefined questions and answers about the service.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Renders the homepage with a hero section, feature highlights, and navigation actions depending on authentication state.
frontend/src/pages/HowItWorksPage.tsx: Shows a step-by-step overview of the design process with descriptive sections and icons.
frontend/src/pages/NotFoundPage.tsx: Provides a simple 404 page with a message and a button to return home.
frontend/src/pages/onboarding/Onboarding: Implements a multi-step onboarding quiz for selecting room type, styles, budget, and timeline before creating a project brief.
frontend/src/pages/onboarding/ProjectBri: Shows a review of the user's quiz selections and handles submission of a new project brief with authentication and status feedback.
frontend/src/pages/PackagesPage.tsx: Fetches and displays design packages, handling loading and error states, with a hero and detailed package cards.
frontend/src/pages/products/FurnitureSub: Fetches and displays products for a given furniture subcategory with loading, error, and empty-state handling.
frontend/src/pages/products/ProductBrand: Displays products for a selected brand, handling loading, errors, missing brands, and empty product lists with UI states.
Lists all product brands with loading and error handling, linking each brand to its detail page.
frontend/src/pages/products/ProductCateg: Fetches and displays product categories with sorted ordering, fallback images, and full loading/error states.
Shows all products within a specific category, including loading, error, and empty-category messaging.
frontend/src/pages/products/RoomCategory: Renders a landing page for browsing room-based product packages via the StylePackagesSection component.
frontend/src/pages/products/ShopLandingP: Provides the main shop landing page with product search and tiles linking to room packages, categories, and brands.
frontend/src/pages/projects/ProjectWorks: Displays project details and notes, allows adding notes, and handles loading, errors, and identity-based note submission.
frontend/src/pages/RoomVisualizerPage.ts: Implements a manual room visualizer allowing users to upload a room photo, select products, and position/scale them on a preview canvas.
frontend/src/routes/RequireAuth.tsx: A wrapper route component that checks Internet Identity state and either shows loading, a sign-in prompt, or the protected children.
frontend/src/state/cartStore.ts: Zustand store managing cart items with add, bulk add, remove, quantity update, clear, subtotal, and item count logic, persisted to storage.
frontend/src/state/onboardingStore.ts: Zustand store for onboarding data including room type, styles, budget, timeline, and selected package with setters and reset.
frontend/src/utils/format.ts: Utility functions for formatting INR currency and converting bigint timestamps to date or datetime strings.
frontend/src/utils/locations.ts: Returns a predefined location list with Ahmedabad forced to the first position without duplication.
frontend/src/utils/roomPackageSort.ts: Defines sort options and a function to sort products by name or price in ascending or descending order.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and managing URL or hash-based query values.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind config defining theme extensions, colors, typography, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Project state describing existing and requested features related to global product search and furniture category expansion.
